Notes: A platform that moves on a set path and disappears after reaching the end. Once it disappears, it will reappear at the start after a few seconds. Lastly, it also supports an optional Bloom model.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_PARAM.Description: The path movement speed is adjusted with ParamScale while this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement hwhen this switch is activated.

Rail.Description: The path that it moves on.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.

DemoCast.Description: The object takes part in the cutscene.

BaseMtxFollowTarget.Description: Objects of this class can be followed by another BaseMtxFollower object.
